title: Nature Wander at Buttertubs Marsh Park | Vancouver Island University | Canada
text:
September 19 2025, 3 - 5:30 pm
Join us for a walk or roll through Buttertubs Marsh Park.
Along the way, stop at stations hosted by local partner organizations, offering activities like birdwatching and scavenger hunts.
Join a group or explore at your own pace.
Free, family-friendly and wheelchair accessible. Limited free parking available. To access by transit, take the #5, #15 or #15A.
Questions? Contact Ariadne at ariadne@stewardshipcentrebc.ca.
Walks begin every 30 minutes between 3 and 5:30 pm
Date and Time:
September 19 2025, 3 - 5:30 pm
Attendance:
In-person
Location:
Off-campus
Organizer:
Stewardship Centre for BC
Contact:
Ariadne@stewardshipcentrebc.caAdd to calendar:
